content: I've actually been thinking about getting a new bag for work, something more stylish and professional-looking. I've been browsing online stores and have shortlisted a few options. Before I make a purchase, I wanted to get some advice on how to keep my daily commuter bag organized. Speaking of which, I recently donated an old tote bag that I hadn't used in years to Goodwill about a month ago, which made me realize how much clutter I had accumulated.
